original_text:
“Then loud beat the horses' hoofs
    with the galloping, galloping of his steeds.
korean_text: 그 때에 군마가 빨리 달리니 말굽 소리가 땅을 울리도다

sentences.original_text: Then loud beat the horses' hoofs
with the galloping, galloping of his steeds.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 준마들이 달리는, 달리는 소리와 함께
